document_data.name: Eldarin
document_data.mainbody: '''Eldarin''' was a male [[human]] slaver who worked with [[Suna Seni]] in the City of Coin, [[Athkatla]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Eldarin was a [[fighter]] with pale skin and light blonde hair.
document_data.Possessions: He wore a set of [[enchanted]] ''+1'' [[plate mail]] and used a [[composite longbow]] in combat along with magic ''+1'' [[arrow]]s. An expensive but non-magical [[bloodstone]] [[amulet]] hung around Eldarin's neck.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Eldarin and Suna Seni worked with a cabal of slavers who operated out of slums in Athkatla. When [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Abdel Adrian]] interrupted the slaving operations, Eldarin and Suna Seni began hunting the adventurer  and his companions across the City of Coin. Both were believed dead after an unsuccessful attempt to kill their mark.
